cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 65 mi NNE of Puerto Plata, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest between Hispaniola and the Turks & Caicos toward the Bahamas and eventually the Florida peninsula

weather_observation.watch_coast: None in effect for Puerto Rico
weather_observation.warning_coast: None in effect for Puerto Rico
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Caribbean including Puerto Rico, northern Dominican Republic, Turks and Caicos, Bahamas
weather_observation.wind: Passing tropical-storm-force gusts possible but diminishing as Irma moves away
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor residual surge; water levels subsiding
weather_observation.rainfall: Additional 2â€“4 in. (isolated 6 in.) could trigger flash flooding
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along the northern and eastern coasts
